programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep28
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep318
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Bulan Terbelah di Hati Mas Silver
programme.desc: Fikri, seorang lelaki tampan dan sederhana yang sedang mencari pekerjaan. Suatu hari, dia ditawarkan oleh rakannya untuk berkerja sebagai manusia silver. Walaupun pada awalnya, dia ragu, Fikri akhirnya menerima tawaran tersebut kerana memerlukan duit. Namun, pada waktu pertama kali bekerja, Fikri telah tertangkap dan berkenalan dengan Bulan, seorang komandan Satpoll PP yang cantik namun tegas. Meskipun pekerjaan mereka sangat berbeza, benih cinta mulai tumbuh antara mereka.

programme.title: Konser Luar Biasa Sayang Via Vallen
programme.desc: Konser Luar Biasa: Sayang Via Vellen merupakan acara musik istimewa meraikan perjalan kerjaya penyanyi dangdut Indonesia, Via Vallen. Konsert ini menyiarkan persembahan lagu-lagu hit Via Vallen antaranya yang paling popular, "Sayang". Selain dari persembahan solo beliau, Via berkolaborasi dengan pelbagai artis, seperti Candil, Didi Kempoit dan adiknya, Merfinda dan Mela, mempamerkan nyanyian duet yang hebat.

programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep318
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa Ep21
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa Ep22
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep28
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Bulan Terbelah di Hati Mas Silver
programme.desc: Fikri, seorang lelaki tampan dan sederhana yang sedang mencari pekerjaan. Suatu hari, dia ditawarkan oleh rakannya untuk berkerja sebagai manusia silver. Walaupun pada awalnya, dia ragu, Fikri akhirnya menerima tawaran tersebut kerana memerlukan duit. Namun, pada waktu pertama kali bekerja, Fikri telah tertangkap dan berkenalan dengan Bulan, seorang komandan Satpoll PP yang cantik namun tegas. Meskipun pekerjaan mereka sangat berbeza, benih cinta mulai tumbuh antara mereka.

programme.title: Konser Luar Biasa Pantura Hae Hae
programme.desc: Konser Luar Biasa Pantura Hae Hae merupakan acara musik yang menampilkan bintang terbesar Pantura (Pantai Utara Jawa) dan musik dangdut koplo. Konsert ini menamplikan persembahan yang bertenaga, dicampur dengan dangdut hit moden dan tradisional.

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep101
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. Beberapa tahun berlalu, Rafael akhirnya disahkan meninggal dunia. Shafira kemudian membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin semula dengan Julian. Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep29
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep319
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Cinta Tak Kasat Mata
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis cantik bernama Marsha yang sering dihantui oleh Vino, seorang lelaki misteri yang tidak kelihatan oleh orang lain. Vino adalah mangsa pertikaian asmara yang menyebabkan kematiannya. Walaupun Marsha merasa takut pada awalnya, Vino terus membantu Marsha. Namun, Marsha mulai ragu jika Vino memang wujud atau hanya ilusi.

programme.title: Konser Raya 3 Dekade Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Kedua Ep2
programme.desc: Konser Raya 3 Dekade Indosiar Luar Biasa, meraikan ulang tahun ke-30 Indosiar Luar Biasa! 3 malam penuh kemeriahan bersama lebih daripada 300 artis hebat dan dihoskan oleh Idola Indonesia.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: Enemies In-Law
programme.desc: Chul-soo, the son of a robber family, falls in love with Young-hee, a daughter from a cop family. To get married, he must pass the cop exam, but his parents try to stop him from doing both.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Hello Ghost
programme.desc: A man has many failed suicide attempts. After the most recent one, he discovers he can see a family of ghosts. The ghosts agree to leave him alone under the condition that he fulfill their requests.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Nocturnal
programme.desc: After his brother Seok-tae returns as a bloody corpse, Min-tae discovers the death of his brother was foretold in a novel, and Seok-tae's wife had a suspicious call with the novelist...

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Aespa: World Tour In Cinemas
programme.desc: Witness aespa's first world tour with futuristic stage visuals, high-energy choreography and captivating vocals. Exclusive behind-the-scenes interviews offer a glimpse behind the curtain.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Love Clinique
programme.desc: Dong-ju joins school choir for Min-soo even she is tone-deaf. They reunite 10 years later. She wants to impress him so she enrolls in a vocal training clinic where Shin-hong trains her...

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A protest against urban renewal leads to death of a cop and a teen. The boy's father was arrested for the cop's death. A young attorney is assigned to defend the father.

programme.title: Taeyong: Ty Track In Cinemas
programme.desc: Taeyong is the first NCT member to make a solo debut. He released a mini album and held a 2-day concert. Witness his outstanding performance and take a closer look at him behind the stage.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Cafe Midnight
programme.desc: Yoon went searching for her groom Taeyoung who didn't show up on the wedding day. She arrives at a strange place called 'Cafe Midnight' by chance and found a younger Taeyoung from the past.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Worst Woman
programme.desc: Eun-hee is an actress with poor acting and she acts in her life. She creates different characters when she dates a man. Eventually, her lies are tangled up and everything is messed up...

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: 12.12: The Day
programme.desc: Based on the 12.12 Military Insurrection. Chun Doo-Gwang staged a coup. Lee Tae-Shin is a commander who fights against Chun. The chaos led Seoul to an unexpected direction.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: Nocturnal
programme.desc: After his brother Seok-tae returns as a bloody corpse, Min-tae discovers the death of his brother was foretold in a novel, and Seok-tae's wife had a suspicious call with the novelist...

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep85
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5123
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep13
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep283
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5126
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behaviour and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. His teenage nephew Zhou, who is ashamed of his stutter, becomes Wang's only friend. Together, these misfits challenge traditional family expectations and social misunderstandings, supporting and inspiring each other as they seek their own paths in life.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai becomes the prime suspect in a police murder case. He takes hostages at the police station and demands to negotiate with former negotiator Jun. As the two engage in a high-stake battle of wits, their expertise in psychological manipulation leads to a tense verbal sparring match, gradually shifting their positions and mind sets.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora. After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong. Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behaviour and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. His teenage nephew Zhou, who is ashamed of his stutter, becomes Wang's only friend. Together, these misfits challenge traditional family expectations and social misunderstandings, supporting and inspiring each other as they seek their own paths in life.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and guarded by top martial arts masters. Two powerful patriots need to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his fathers martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tians rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tians granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lous brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Vengeance is a Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: Gan Dai Xiong is killed by Prince Wu, who seeks to seize his Purple Sword. Prince Wus son join forces with an evil gang to steal the Purple Sword from Gan Dai Xiongs three daughters. Eventually, Gans daughters team up with their cousin Xu to avenge their fathers death.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru S1 Ep33
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Dynasties S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chimpanzee - In Senegal, West Africa, live a group of chimpanzees, led by an alpha male named David. He has already been alpha for 3 years - a time when leaders here are usually overthrown. To make matters worse, David has no allies - no-one to help him defend his leadership.

programme.title: Deadly 60 S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Very Hungry Hippos - Steve heads to Zambia for the first time, where he hears hippo communication on a whole new level, spots a high-diving croc and meets some incredible sniffer dogs.

programme.title: Deadly 60 S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Steve's River Expedition - Steve heads to Suriname, a country with more forest than anywhere else on earth. He kayaks upriver in search of some deadly critters.

programme.title: Portillo's Andalucia S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cadiz and Jerez - Michael takes part in an exercise to hoist the mainsail of an 80-metre long tall ship.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 5 - Wildfires in Oregon, flash floods in Arizona, a family survive the most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippines and a story of survival in sub-zero temperatures for seven days in the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kate Winslet - Acclaimed movie star Kate Winslet takes a role like never before, as Bear paramotors them both to the top of the Snowdonia Mountains in Wales.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Nobody Likes Visiting the Dentist - Head into surgery with Mara the koala, who needs a life-saving tooth operation, then assess an injured sugar glider with vet Tim. Cheer as rescue officer Elise pulls a flying fox out of a gutter and see nurse Brees clutch of python eggs hatch.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mate-attracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs traffic-dodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Superpowers - Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs prey-detecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bird Paradise - Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Ones - Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megasharks stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mate-attracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs traffic-dodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Escape - Watch as the Lilongwe Wildlife team try to release two serval cats into the wild. One escapes and returns injured. Will their release be successful? A new baby vervet arrives in critical condition, and a giant owl flies to freedom.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Buck Chase - Join Amanda on a white knuckle bush-whacking adventure to rescue a waterbuck caught by a poacher's snare. Meanwhile, the center's resident hyena is treated for flea bitten ears and Alma gets a mysterious late night monkey delivery.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Peccary Party - Trek through the forests and savannahs of the Pantanals Nhecolndia region, which is home to noisy herds of peccaries. Follow these pig-like mammals on their daily food-foraging routes, and run into roseate spoonbills and capybaras along the way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Platypus Predicament - Stand by as rescue officers use a technique called flagging to nab a koala with dangerously inflamed eyes. Soothe burned possum feet with vet Tim, then shadow vet Karina as she examines a half-drowned platypus before referring him to a specialist.

programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Desert-Adapted Elephant - Trek across the Namibian desert with the bush elephant and learn how it keeps its cool in a place with little food or shade. Discover how this giant consumes specific plants, digs wells, and hikes endless dunes in a quest to find precious water.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Saltwater Crocodile - Navigate a mangrove forest in Borneo with the saltwater crocodile, which is perfectly suited to life among the watery roots. Discover how this reptile uses the environment to regulate its temperature and why its epic patience makes it a super hunter.

programme.desc: Jaguar Den - In the heart of Brazil, the largest cat in the Americas, the magnificent jaguar, reigns over a magical land filled with natural beauty and diversity.

programme.desc: Turtle Trouble - Juggle the demands of caring for sick koala joeys with vet Claire, then see what it takes to save a squirrel glider caught in barbed wire. Take care of an exhausted owl and get a big surprise when vet Tim X-rays a turtle that was struck by a car.

programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Hiding Pirates - Everyone is excited about singing sea shanties in the big Pirate Party in Toyland. But when Scurvy the Parrot arrives at Toy Green all on his own Noddy soon realises that the pirates are missing. Where can they have gone? Noddy uses his best investigating skills of tracking, listening, looking and thinking to follow the clues and find out what's happened to the pirates - not helped by a loudly squawking Scurvy! When he discovers that the pirates have lost their voices from over-practising their new sea shanty, Noddy comes up with an idea for how Scurvy's loud voice can help save the day. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to DAngelo to aid an injured dragon, and DAngelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep11
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blades life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhminis hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years shes been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces its time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes shes got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep11
programme.desc: Shock and Awww - Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8

programme.title: Rob The Robot S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Space Virus Blues - Rob the Robot and his friends, Orbit, Ema, T.K., and Squeak, take adventures across the many amazing planets in the Robot Galaxy in a fantastical world of fun and imagination. Each mission requires the help or involvement of his friends and their unique abilities, be it T.K.s logical thinking or Emas language and early reading knowledge. The adventures, while creative and fun, remain sufficiently rooted in real life experiences of preschoolers not only to intrigue and entertain but still make sense. Fun, laughter and learning are just a rocket - hop away!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Avocado Sushi / Poi - Chef is so focused on his avocado's perfect ripeness that he ignores the rest of his avocado sushi recipe. Chef's friend inspires him to bring Hawai'i home.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Chili & Cornbread - Chef entrusts Olly with his super-special cornbread pan. But things go terribly wrong when she dents it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans. Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot. Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep221
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Winter Wonderland / The Crew Builds A Giant Snow Squirrely Whirly - Rubble & Crew work together to transform Builder Cove's beach boardwalk into a bright, festive winter wonderland. A snow day gets in the way of Motor & Mix's Super Squirrely Whirly plans.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hotel / The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail - Builder Cove gets its first hotel when Farmer Zoe's cousin Hadley comes to visit. A hiking trail mix-up confuses everyone going to Mr. Ducky-Doo's birthday party.

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Grumple Games - Dora teams up with Hearty the Grumple so she can finally compete in the Grumple Games.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep63
programme.desc: Say Hello - Tinky Winky and Laa-Laa are in Home Dome when the Tubby Phone rings. It's Dipsy and Po calling from the Tubby Mobile to say 'Hello'.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Book - Dee encourages a friend to say book and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Downhill Racers - It's the annual go-kart race, and Zip has chosen the racecourse, but is worried it isn't as fun as the ones before, so he tries to make the racecourse more exciting.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Tick Tock Messy - Messy goes to OKIDO to play with Zim and Zam's new discovery, but will he and his friends get back from this adventure in time?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep33
programme.desc: Granny Mobile - Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Tradies - Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep49
programme.desc: The Nazca Lines, Peru - The Go Jetters race to protect ancient artwork in Peru, when Glitch erases the Nazca Lines.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Dunny - Mum bans the girls from saying the word 'dunny' because it's not a word the Queen of England would use, but the kids try and trick her into saying it anyway.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Ice Cream - Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each other's ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they don't notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Andy and the Blue Duck Chicks - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to New Zealand on a baby animal mission to help rescue a family of blue ducks and their chicks from a fast flowing river. Along the way, Andy takes a ride on a pukeko chick and meets a hedgehog.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Mission: Pop Pop - Newfoundland Sylvie is a big therapy dog who loves to help people when they are worried with big soft cuddles. Sylvie and Katrina help a young boy named Alfie visit his great-grandfather.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Sun Bear and Rainbow Lorikeet - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal a connection between them in the wild. This time, it's the sun bear and the rainbow lorikeet.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep19
programme.desc: Pirate Stickers - Sandy and Seaweed have started collecting "Famous Pirates and Crew of the World" stickers only to discover there's one last rare sticker to find.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep23
programme.desc: The Mix Tape Badge - The Squirrels are exploring in the attic when they find an old cassette tape.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep22
programme.desc: The Election Badge - It's time for the summer fair, and Eugene is the organiser.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Golden Gate Bridge, USA - On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridge's foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Giant's Causeway, Northern Ireland - A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giant's Causeway!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep18
programme.desc: Nia's Bright Idea - Nia uses what she learns about lighthouses to suggest covering a big wheel in Christmas lights, so that Harold can see where he's going in a storm.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Shallot Boat - After a night of strong rain, the Shallots set sail on a seafaring adventure.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Planetarium Aquarium - Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Knitting - Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Runaway Train - Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Best Bike in the World - When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Time to Press a Flower - JoJo and Gran Gran press a flower so that it will last for a long time. JoJo learns that flowers wilt over time but flower pressing is a special way to make them last longer.

programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Usman vs. Buckley
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant UFC champions of all-time returns to the welterweight division on June 15 when Kamaru Usman faces off with rising star Joaquin Buckley in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at State Farm Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. The king of the 170-pounders for over three years, Usman has his sights set on regaining his title, but on the fast track to the top is Buckley, who brings a six-fight winning streak into the biggest fight of his career. Plus, Miranda Maverick hopes to punch her ticket into the world title conversation by turning back former champion Rose Namajunas in a pivotal co-main event showdown in the flyweight division.
